name: 陳文學
objective:
本課程將介紹工程上、物理上系統解析的相關數學工具，內容包括五大項：
一 常微分方程式：一階，二階，及高階常微分方程，拉譜拉斯轉換，   特殊函數。
二 向量幾何與分析：矩陣行列式及特徵問題。
三 傅立葉級數，積分及轉換。
四 偏微分方程及邊界值問題。
五 複變分析及映射轉換。
schedule:
Week 1 Introduction, Terminology and Separable Equations
Week 2 Linear Equations
Week 3 Exact, Homogeneous Equations
Week 4 Bernoulli and Riccati Equations, Additional Applications
Week 5 Theory of the Linear Second-Order Equation
Week 6 The Constant Coefficient Case
Week 7 The Nonhomogeneous Equation, Spring Motion
Week 8 Euler’s Equation
Week 9 High Order Differential Equations, Midterm Exam.
Week 10 Definition and Notation, Solution of Initial Value Problems
Week 11 Shifting and the Heaviside Function
Week 12 Convolution
Week 13 Impulses and the Delta Function
Week 14 Solution of Systems
Week 15 Polynomial Coefficients
Week 16 Power Series Solutions
Week 17 Frobenius Solutions
Week 18 Final Exam.
materials:
Textbook: Advanced Engineering Mathematics 7th Edition
Peter V. O’Neil
Reference Book：Differential Equations with Boundary-Value Problems 6th Ed.
Dennis G. Zill and Michael R. Cullen
